statements: DELETE FROM circulation WHERE newspaper_name = 'New York Times'
DELETE FROM circulation WHERE route_id = 10 AND quantity_distributed < 100;
DELETE FROM circulation WHERE magazine_name = 'TechNews' AND delivery_schedule = 'Daily';
DELETE FROM magazines WHERE delivery_schedule = 'Weekly' AND quantity_distributed <= 1000;
DELETE FROM quantities_distributed WHERE route_id = 5 OR route_id = 9;
DELETE FROM quantities_distributed WHERE route_id = 4 AND newspaper_quantity > 100 AND magazine_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM circulation_routes WHERE area_covered = 'City Center';
